name: Good Luck Working for Mr. D
name_original: Good Luck Working for Mr. D
description:
"If you'll be doing great I might 
even get you an ugly souvenir 
from hell."

"Good Luck working for Mr.D" - is a short RPG-maker game, where you fulfill customer's needs in 10 seconds. Depending on whose wishes you fulfilled and whose are not the ending might be slightly different.

FEATURES
Nice stock music
Cool demons
Ability to lose
Just a little bit of fun :)

CONTROLS
[← ↑ → ↓] to move
[Enter] to interact
[Esc] to cancel\open menu
[F5] for fullscreen

CREDIT
bun_tired - game developer, art, leader
starsh01 - background art
whitemoonblackbunny - character art

SOUND CREDIT
